mapper.insert: insert into mf_ghpsrk(lx, lsh, lrid, lrusername, truename, status, lrsj, cksj, fcsj, sdsj, driver_code, path_code,dept_code,store_code) select b.status,a.lsh, lrid, lrusername, truename, 2, lrsj, cksj, fcsj, sdsj, driver_code, path_code,dept_code,store_code from mf_ghps a left join mf_ghps_mx b on a.lsh=b.lsh where a.lsh=#{lsh}
insert into mf_ghpsrk_mx(lsh,ddh,status) select lsh,ddh,status from mf_ghps_mx where lsh=#{lsh}
mapper.update: update mf_ghpsrk set status = 3 where lsh=#{lsh} and status=2
mapper.select: select lsh,a.lrid,a.driver_code as driverCode,b.driver_name as driverName, a.lrusername, a.truename,case a.lx when 1 then '送达' when 2 then '未送达' end as lxInfo, a.path_code as pathCode,c.path_name as pathName, a.lrsj,a.fcsj,a.sdsj,a.status,a.store_code as storeCode,d.store_name as storeName, case a.status when 2 then '待入库' when 3 then '已入库' end as statusInfo from mf_ghpsrk a left join mf_driver b on a.driver_code = b.driver_code left join mf_path c on a.path_code = c.path_code left join mf_store d on a.store_code = d.store_code inner join mf_user e on a.store_code = e.storage_code where e.id=#{uid} and a.status = #{status} order by a.lsh desc
